column5: While in Canada, we will have schools of minnows swim by the boat numerous times while fishing. Is it illegal to scoop some out if you took a fine mesh butterfly net if you were simply going to use them as bait on the spot and not transport or even take back to camp?
Not sure on the legality of it, but my guess is it would be nearly impossible to actually catch them. They are FAST.
This question has come up before. If your a Canadian citizen its legal it not I believe its illegal. Try the search function on the tool bar. Good luck!

"Only resident anglers may capture baitfish, using the methods outlined below."Excerpted from the Ontario fishing regs. The regs appear in full by clicking on the sticky at the top of this Canada forum.
